sections.description: Latest version of the WP Mailchimp Integration plugin.
sections.changelog:
# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https.keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https.semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

## [1.0.12] - 2026-02-20
* fixed $download_url and url of info.json
* fix to address issues with the Setup Wizard and Saving Settings
* tweaks to release script to update distribution version
* changelog automation and release script modifications
* auto-update functionality and release version publication to public repo
* fixed activation bug -- hopefully
* v 1.0.5 -- build script revisions
* Advanced User Sync
* advanced user sync functionality added
* done part 1
* IDE fuckery
* roadmap and wizard
* updated exclusions
* AI integration
* pre mail processor



## [1.0.11] - 2026-02-20
* changelog automation and release script modifications
* auto-update functionality and release version publication to public repo
* fixed activation bug -- hopefully
* v 1.0.5 -- build script revisions
* Advanced User Sync
* advanced user sync functionality added
* done part 1
* IDE fuckery
* roadmap and wizard
* updated exclusions
* AI integration
* pre mail processor


- Auto-update functionality and release version publication to public repo
- Fixed activation bug

## [1.0.5] - 2026-02-19
### Added
- Advanced User Sync functionality 

### Changed
- Build script revisions
- Roadmap and wizard updates
- Updated exclusions
- AI integration
- Pre mail processor

### Fixed
- IDE configuration issues

### Other
- Initial re-commit
